body:
I'm going to Okinawa!
I will not be able to play Avicus....
Have fun people!
Thanks for reading.
-Xvius

title: Vacation!

replies.body:
1. Discussions surrounding personal updates, accomplishments or events is frowned upon as they are meant to be inclusive rather than oriented around a single person. Punishments for this will only be distributed in the event that a user continuously uses the forums for this purpose alone.

    Have fun on vacation though.
